sections.title: Acceptance of Terms
sections.content: By accessing and using Techrover's services, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.

sections.title: Services Description
sections.content: Techrover provides technology solutions including AI development, ERP systems, web development, digital marketing, and related services.

sections.title: User Obligations
sections.content: You agree to use our services only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information.

sections.title: Intellectual Property
sections.content: All content, features, and functionality of our services are owned by Techrover and are protected by copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.

sections.title: Payment Terms
sections.content: Payment terms will be specified in individual service agreements. All fees are non-refundable unless otherwise stated in writing.

sections.title: Limitation of Liability
sections.content: Techrover shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages resulting from your use of our services.

sections.title: Governing Law
sections.content: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of India, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
